Font Weight

# Font Weight

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                   | Support        |
| ----------------------- | -------------- |
| ```
font-thin
```       | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
font-extralight
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
font-light
```      | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
font-normal
```     | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
font-medium
```     | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
font-semibold
```   | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
font-bold
```       | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
font-extrabold
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
font-black
```      | ✅ Full Support |
